frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useApprovalManagement: Provides React Query hooks for user approval operations including listing approvals, approving users, and rejecting users, with automatic query invalidation after mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, tasks, and admin operations like approving/rejecting users, using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegistration.ts: Provides mutation hooks for self-registration of clients, partners, and internal users, invalidating relevant queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuperadminClaim.ts: Exports hooks to check if a superadmin exists and to claim superadmin privileges, invalidating user-related queries after claiming.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for a premium boutique theme supporting light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom colors using OKLCH, typography, container queries, animations, and design tokens for a premium UI.
